title: Plastic-Free July
description: Avoid single-use plastics for an entire month to reduce landfill waste and pollution.

title: Cycle to Work Week
description: Ride your bike to work or school for one week to cut carbon emissions and improve your fitness.

title: Save Water Challenge
description: Commit to shorter showers and fixing leaks for 10 days. Every drop counts toward a sustainable future.

title: Energy Saver Month
description: Unplug idle devices, switch to LED bulbs, and cut unnecessary power use for 30 days.

title: Community Clean-Up Drive
description: Join your neighbors for a weekend park and street clean-up to restore your local environment.
target: Remove litter and restore public spaces

title: No Meat Monday
description: Skip meat every Monday to reduce your dietary carbon footprint.

title: Tree Planting Month
description: Plant and care for a tree this month to help offset carbon emissions and improve air quality.

title: Zero Waste Week
description: Challenge yourself to create no waste for an entire week — reuse, recycle, and rethink consumption.

title: Reusable Bottle Challenge
description: Use a refillable water bottle every day this month to eliminate single-use plastic bottles.

title: Public Transport Week
description: Use public transportation instead of private vehicles for one week to lower emissions.

title: Solar Awareness Month
description: Learn about solar energy and switch one appliance to renewable energy this month.

title: Eco-Friendly Commute Day
description: Use eco-friendly transport — cycling, walking, or carpooling — for a day.

title: Digital Declutter Week
description: Reduce energy use by deleting unused files, unsubscribing from spam, and managing cloud storage efficiently.

title: Green Office Challenge
description: Encourage your office to adopt sustainable practices like paperless systems and recycling bins.
target: Reduce office waste and energy use

title: Car-Free Weekend
description: Avoid using cars for two days. Walk, cycle, or take public transport instead.

title: Switch Off Hour
description: Turn off all lights and devices for one hour in the evening to save energy.

title: Upcycle Creativity Challenge
description: Create something new from old or discarded items and share your creation with the community.
target: Promote creative reuse and waste reduction

title: Paperless Week
description: Avoid printing and go fully digital for a week to reduce paper waste.

title: Eco Swap Event
description: Swap clothes, books, or items you no longer use with others to promote reuse.

title: Home Garden Week
description: Grow your own herbs, vegetables, or flowers to support biodiversity at home.
